title: Group portrait of birthday party participants, from left, kneeling: Charles Hampton, Turner Green, and Reginald Roach; seated: Barbara Mills, Carole VeLar, Donna Rideout, Bernice VeLar, Antoinette McTurner, Norma Pedigrew, Sarah Burney, and Leo Turner; standing: William Harris, Ronald Talbert, Joseph Herd, Wynn Jones, Roger Thomas, Carl Dorsey, Tim Williams, guest of honor; Betty Ferguson, Barbara Brooks, and David Carmichael, posed in Tim Williams home, 3300 Iowa Street
